StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterUser]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FirstName varchar(100), @LastName varchar(100), @OrgUnitID int ) AS
SELECT RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, RP.RANK_CODE, P.PERSON_ID, P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, P.SUFFIX_CD, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, CASE WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) END AS [DisplayName], RP.[RowGuid], RP.ORGANIZATION_ID, RP.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, RP.PAY_GRADE_CODE, P.[DOD_ID] FROM RECRUITING_PERSON RP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN PERSON p ON p.PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro ON ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = rp.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ro.OrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID AND p.FIRST_NAME = @FirstName AND p.LAST_NAME = @LastName
